verses.verse: If there be a <S%H7379>controversy<s%> between <S%H582>men<s%>, and they <S%H5066>come<s%> unto <S%H4941>judgment<s%>, and the judges <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H6663>them<s%>; then they shall justify the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>, and <S%H7561>condemn<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>;

and it shall <S%H7563>be<s%>, if the wicked man be <S%H1121>worthy<s%> to be <S%H5221>beaten<s%>, that the <S%H8199>judge<s%> shall cause him to lie <S%H5307>down<s%>, and to be <S%H5221>beaten<s%> before his <S%H6440>face<s%>, <S%H1767>according<s%> to his <S%H7564>wickedness<s%>, by <S%H4557>number<s%>.

Forty <S%H705><s%> <S%H5221>stripes<s%> he may give <S%H3254>him<s%>, he shall not exceed; <S%H3254>lest<s%>, if he should exceed, and <S%H5221>beat<s%> him above these with <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4347>stripes<s%>, then thy <S%H251>brother<s%> should seem vile unto <S%H7034>thee<s%>.
Thou shalt not <S%H2629>muzzle<s%> the <S%H7794>ox<s%> when he treadeth out the <S%H1778>grain<s%>.

If <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>, and <S%H259>one<s%> of them <S%H4191>die<s%>, and have no <S%H1121>son<s%>, the <S%H802>wife<s%> of the <S%H4191>dead<s%> shall not be married <S%H2351>without<s%> unto a <S%H376>stranger<s%>: her <S%H2993>husband<s%>'s brother shall go <S%H935>in<s%> unto <S%H3947>her<s%>, and take her to him to <S%H802>wife<s%>, and perform the duty of a <S%H2992>husband<s%>'s brother unto her.

And it shall <S%H1060>be<s%>, that the first-born that she <S%H3205>beareth<s%> shall <S%H6965>succeed<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H251>brother<s%> that is <S%H4191>dead<s%>, that his <S%H8034>name<s%> be not blotted <S%H4229>out<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And if the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2654>like<s%> not to <S%H3947>take<s%> his <S%H2994>brother<s%>'s wife, then his <S%H2994>brother<s%>'s wife shall go <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H8179>gate<s%> unto the <S%H2205>elders<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%>, My <S%H2993>husband<s%>'s brother <S%H3985>refuseth<s%> to raise <S%H6965>up<s%> unto his <S%H251>brother<s%> a <S%H8034>name<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; he <S%H14>will<s%> not perform the duty of a <S%H2992>husband<s%>'s brother unto me.

Then the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H1696>him<s%>, and speak unto <S%H5975>him<s%>: and if he stand, and <S%H559>say<s%>, I <S%H2654>like<s%> not to take <S%H3947>her<s%>;

then shall his <S%H2994>brother<s%>'s wife <S%H5066>come<s%> unto him in the <S%H5869>presence<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%>, and <S%H2502>loose<s%> his <S%H5275>shoe<s%> from off his <S%H7272>foot<s%>, and <S%H3417>spit<s%> in his <S%H6440>face<s%>; and she shall <S%H6030>answer<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%>, So shall it be <S%H6213>done<s%> unto the <S%H376>man<s%> that doth not build <S%H1129>up<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>.
And his <S%H8034>name<s%> shall be <S%H7121>called<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, The <S%H1004>house<s%> of him that hath his <S%H5275>shoe<s%> <S%H2502>loosed<s%>.

When <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H5327>strive<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> one with <S%H251>another<s%>, and the <S%H802>wife<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> draweth <S%H7126>near<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of him that <S%H5221>smiteth<s%> <S%H7971>him<s%>, and putteth forth her <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H2388>taketh<s%> him by the <S%H4016>secrets<s%>;
then thou shalt cut <S%H7112>off<s%> her <S%H3709>hand<s%>, thine <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall have no <S%H2347>pity<s%>.
Thou shalt not have in thy <S%H3599>bag<s%> diverse <S%H68>weights<s%>, a <S%H1419>great<s%> and a <S%H6996>small<s%>.
Thou shalt not have in thy <S%H1004>house<s%> diverse <S%H374>measures<s%>, a <S%H1419>great<s%> and a <S%H6996>small<s%>.

A <S%H8003>perfect<s%> and <S%H6664>just<s%> <S%H68>weight<s%> shalt thou <S%H8003>have<s%>; a perfect and <S%H6664>just<s%> <S%H374>measure<s%> shalt thou <S%H3117>have<s%>: that thy days may be <S%H748>long<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> giveth <S%H5414>thee<s%>.
For all that <S%H6213>do<s%> such <S%H428>things<s%>, even all that <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H5766>unrighteously<s%>, are an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>.
Remember <S%H2142><s%> what <S%H6002>Amalek<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> unto thee by the <S%H1870>way<s%> as ye came <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>;

how he <S%H7136>met<s%> thee by the <S%H1870>way<s%>, and smote the <S%H2179>hindmost<s%> of <S%H2826>thee<s%>, all that were feeble <S%H310>behind<s%> <S%H5889>thee<s%>, when thou wast faint and <S%H3023>weary<s%>; and he <S%H3373>feared<s%> not <S%H430>God<s%>.

Therefore it shall <S%H3068>be<s%>, when Jehovah thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath given thee <S%H5117>rest<s%> from all thine <S%H341>enemies<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, in the <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H4229>it<s%>, that thou shalt blot out the <S%H2143>remembrance<s%> of <S%H6002>Amalek<s%> from under <S%H8064>heaven<s%>; thou shalt not <S%H7911>forget<s%>.
